channel.title: Hardware on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on C'est la Z

item.title: Pinebook Pro - an $200 Linux Laptop
item.description: I'm writing this on my new Pinebook Pro - a $200 ARM based Linux laptop. The Pinebook Pro comes from the Pine64 project. As you could figure out, they do the Pine64 which is similar to a Raspberry Pi and they've got some cool projects. In addition to the Pinebook pro they've also got the Pine Tab and Pine Phone and more. Now, you're not going to be able to go to their site and say "
